src.math.ScalarFields module¶

src.math.VectorFields module¶

class src.math.VectorFields.VectorField(field: ndarray)¶

Bases: Field

Inherit Field class Last entry of shape has to be equal to the number of entries prior

Ex./ shape returns (10,30,5,3), the 4th number in the tuple should be equal to the number of entires prior, which is 3

More functionatilites may be added to this class

Error Checking for this class will be added in the future
